items.name: Ext.dashboard.Part
viewTemplate
items.text: The configuration object used for creating instances of this `Part`. This is used by the createView method to create views.

items.name: createView
displayForm
items.text:
This method should display an appropriate edit form (probably a modal `Ext.Window`
or `Ext.Msg.prompt`) to get or edit configuration for an instance of this part.

See the class documentation for examples on implementing this method.

items.name: instance
items.text: The already existing view or null if called to configure a new instance.

items.name: currentConfig
items.text: The configuration returned from this method for the existing view (`instance`) or null if called to configure a new instance.

items.name: config
items.text: The configuration that defines the instance to be created. This value is passed to createView and applied to the viewTemplate.

items.name: scope
items.text: The scope with which to call the `callback`.

items.name: getId
items.text: Retrieves the id of this component. Will autogenerate an id if one has not already been set.

items.name: _lastId
items.text: The last assigned identifier for instances created by this `Part`.

items.name: factoryConfig
items.text: If this property is specified by the target class of this mixin its properties are used to configure the created Ext.Factory.
